forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: me menu

comments.text: the me menu can be opened by clicking on your ring, then "me"... or by context-lasering yourself.
the me menu also shows a mirror so you can check what you look like, and a voice echo (which can be disable in the "..." settings) to test your mic.
while the me dialog is open, you can grab any placement around you, and drag it onto your empty body attachment spheres.
to delete an attachment again, use the controller delete button. [-> controls]

thread.latestCommentText: to delete an attachment again, use the grip button.
